structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Qualifications for police or auxiliary police officer.
law.text:
As of July 14, 1992, no person shall be originally appointed or employed as a police officer or an auxiliary police officer by a city, urban-county, or charter county government in the Commonwealth unless he:
Is at least twenty-one (21) years of age; and
Is a high school graduate, has received a general equivalency diploma (G.E.D.), or has received a high school diploma through participation in the external diploma program.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 145, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 428, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992.
